import System.IO

readFirstLineOfFile :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe String)
readFirstLineOfFile path = do
    handle <- openFile path ReadMode
    eof <- hIsEOF handle
    if eof
        then do
            hClose handle
            return Nothing
        else do
            firstLine <- hGetLine handle
            hClose handle
            return $ Just firstLine

import System.IO

readFirstLine :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe String)
readFirstLine path = do
    handle <- openFile path ReadMode
    eof <- hIsEOF handle
    if eof
        then do
            hClose handle
            return Nothing
        else do
            line <- hGetLine handle
            hClose handle
            return (Just line)

import System.IO

readFirstLine :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe String)
readFirstLine path = do
    handle <- openFile path ReadMode
    eof <- hIsEOF handle
    if eof
        then do
            hClose handle
            return Nothing
        else do
            line <- hGetLine handle
            hClose handle
            return (Just line)
```

import System.IO

readFirstLine :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe String)
readFirstLine path = do
    handle <- openFile path ReadMode
    eof <- hIsEOF handle
    if eof
        then do
            hClose handle
            return Nothing
        else do
            firstLine <- hGetLine handle
            hClose handle
            return (Just firstLine)

copyFileContents :: FilePath -> FilePath -> IO ()

import System.IO (withFile, IOMode(ReadMode), hGetContents)
import Data.List (isInfixOf)

searchInFile :: FilePath -> String -> IO (Maybe String)
searchInFile filePath searchTerm = withFile filePath ReadMode $ \handle -> do
    contents <- hGetContents handle
    return $ if searchTerm `isInfixOf` contents
             then Just searchTerm
             else Nothing
```

import System.IO

readFileContent :: FilePath -> IO (Either String String)
readFileContent path = do
    handle <- openFile path ReadMode
    content <- hGetContents handle
    return (Right content) `catch` handleReadError
  where
    handleReadError :: IOError -> IO (Either String String)
    handleReadError e = return (Left $ "Error reading file: " ++ show e)

import System.IO

replaceWordInFile :: FilePath -> String -> String -> IO ()
replaceWordInFile filePath oldWord newWord = do
    contents <- readFile filePath
    let newContents = unwords $ map (\word -> if word == oldWord then newWord else word) (words contents)
    writeFile filePath newContents
```

import System.IO

readFirstLine :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe String)
readFirstLine path = do
    handle <- openFile path ReadMode
    eof <- hIsEOF handle
    if eof
        then do
            hClose handle
            return Nothing
        else do
            firstLine <- hGetLine handle
            hClose handle
            return (Just firstLine)
```

import System.IO

readFirstLine :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe String)
readFirstLine path = do
    handle <- openFile path ReadMode
    eof <- hIsEOF handle
    if eof
        then do
            hClose handle
            return Nothing
        else do
            line <- hGetLine handle
            hClose handle
            return (Just line)
